product_name: Deuter Traveller 55 + 10 SL Pack - Women's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: The women-specific Traveller is comfortable to carry and has ample space for items you'll need on your long-distance trip. A removable daypack lets you explore at your destination.
short_description: The women-specific Traveller is comfortable to carry and has ample space for items you'll need on your long-distance trip. A removable daypack lets you explore at your destination.
